about_the_game:
Strange Rules: Mall

Escape from the mall governed by strange rules!

When you and your friends were shopping, you were suddenly trapped in the weird mall, and strange rules appeared in front of you...

1. Don't talk to people in the bathroom!

2. The mall staff wear blue uniforms, and there are absolutely no staff wearing other colors!

3. Don't enter any emergency exits! The emergency exits of this mall are all closed!

4. If you meet a customer wearing a hat, don't talk to him! Don't talk to him!

5. The food area is an absolutely safe area.

6. If you want to stay alive, play the game seriously...

At first you thought it was a prank, but when you saw the customer who was still talking and laughing in the last second, bloody because of breaking the rules, you realized how scary the world you had stepped into was...

Be careful! Many abnormal things will happen in this, always pay attention to the power of strange rules, don't let it devour you...

Game Features:

An adventure game that combines strange rules, exploration and puzzle solving, and role-playing.

You need to follow the rules of the system, explore, discover and collect hidden items in the scene, solve puzzles, escape or defeat enemies, and after completing all this, you will reach the final truth.

Please pay attention to every detail in the scene, the solution to the puzzle is often hidden in an inconspicuous place...

Note: Some content of this game is driven by sound effects, and it is recommended to wear headphones for the best experience.

name: Strange Rules: Mall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1060ti
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX2060

short_description: You and your friends are trapped in a shopping mall with strange rules. Countless strange things appear in front of you... Please abide by everything the system stipulates, so that you have a chance to survive...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
